book.synopsis: The Tuck family is confronted with an agonizing situation when they discover that a ten-year-old girl and a malicious stranger now share their secret about a spring whose water prevents one from ever growing any older. An ALA Notable Book. Reissue.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.5 Inches, Length: 5 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 0.25 Inches
